// SetVehicleShootAtTarget
void SET_VEHICLE_SHOOT_AT_TARGET(Ped driver, Entity entity, float xTarget, float yTarget, float zTarget);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local entity = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_SHOOT_AT_TARGET
SetVehicleShootAtTarget(ped, entity, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
